Field.ReplaceSQL: select itemno from code_library where codeno = 'Currency' and attribute2 = ? and isinuse = '1'
select to_char(to_date(?,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') from dual
select decode(?,'Y','1','N','2','') from dual

select itemno as certtype from code_library where codeno = 'CertType' and attribute2= ? and isinuse ='1'

Field.Description: 接受短信的手机国际区号

Message.SelectSQL: select substr(ba.serialno,1,20) Apply_no, substr(al.serialno,1,20) Loan_no, ba.businesstype Loan_type, replace(al.putoutdate,'/', '') Start_date, ba.businesssum principal, ba.businesscurrency currency, al.loanterm Time_limit, (select businessrate from acct_rate_segment where objectno = al.serialno and objecttype = 'Loan' and ratetype = '01') rate, al.normalbalance + al.overduebalance Outstanding_Principal, al.overduebalance Overdue_Principal, case when al.odintebalance > 0 then al.odintebalance else 0 end ODInterest, al.compintebalance CompoundInterest, replace(al.maturitydate,'/','') Due_time, decode(al.serialno, null, (select decode(phaseno, 'End0', '2', 'End1', '3', 'End2', '5', '1') from flow_object where objectno = ba.serialno and objecttype = 'BusinessApply'), '4') Apply_status, replace(ba.occurdate,'/','') apply_date, nvl(al.defaultpayacctno,ba.payaccountno) Account_no, nvl(al.defaultpayacctname, ba.payaccountname) Account_name, decode( bc.languagetype ,null,substr(ba.languagetype,2,2), substr(bc.languagetype,2,2)) Addr_lang, decode(bc.country,null,ba.country, bc.country) country, '' province, nvl(bc.zipcode, '') Postcode, nvl(bc.mailcode, '') Post_method, decode(bc.address1 ,null, nvl(ba.address1, ' ')||'|' || nvl(ba.address2, ' ')||'|' || nvl(ba.address3, ' ')||'|' || nvl(ba.address4, ' ') , nvl(bc.address1, ' ')||'|' || nvl(bc.address2, ' ')||'|' || nvl(bc.address3, ' ')||'|' || nvl(bc.address4, ' ') ) Addr_detail, ba.signflag SignOnline from business_apply ba left join business_contract bc on ba.serialno = bc.relativeserialno left join acct_loan al on bc.serialno = al.contractserialno
Message.Description: 个贷信息查询响应详情

Field.ReplaceSQL: select attribute2 from code_library where codeno = 'Currency' and itemno = ? and isinuse = '1'
select attribute2 from code_library where codeno = 'CountryCode' and itemno = ? and isinuse ='1'
select attribute2 from code_library where codeno = 'Currency' and itemno = ?

Message.SelectSQL: select * from (select objectno, seqid Installment_No, replace(paydate, '/', '') Installment_date, trunc(sum(nvl(paycorpusamt, 0) + nvl(payinteamt, 0) + nvl(payfineamt, 0) + nvl(paycompdinteamt, 0) + nvl(actualpaycorpusamt, 0) - nvl(actualpayinteamt, 0) - nvl(actualpayinteamt, 0) - nvl(actualcompdinteamt, 0)), 2) overdue_amount, trunc(sum(nvl(paycorpusamt, 0)), 2) Installment_principal, trunc(sum(nvl(payinteamt, 0)), 2) Installment_interest, 0 other_charge, trunc(sum(nvl(payfineamt, 0)), 2) Overdue_interest, trunc(sum(nvl(paycompdinteamt, 0)), 2) compound_interest, trunc(sum(nvl(actualpaycorpusamt, 0)), 2) Actpay_principal, trunc(sum(nvl(actualpayinteamt, 0)), 2) Actpay_interest, 0 Actpay_charge, trunc(sum(nvl(actualfineamt, 0)), 2) Actpay_Overdue_interest, trunc(sum(nvl(actualcompdinteamt, 0)), 2) Actpay_compound_interest, trunc(sum(nvl(corpusbalance, 0)), 2) Outstanding_principal from acct_payment_schedule where finishdate is null and replace((select businessdate from acct_ploan_setup), '/', '') > to_char(to_number(replace(paydate, '/', '')) - 20000) group by objectno, seqid, paydate order by paydate) t
Message.Description: 还款计划查询响应详情

Field.ReplaceSQL: select attribute2 from code_library where codeno = 'Currency' and itemno = ?

Message.SelectSQL: select * from (select p.objectno, p.seqid as Installment_No, replace(l.actualpaydate, '/', '') Actpay_date, replace(l.paydate, '/', '') Installment_date, trunc(nvl(p.paycorpusamt, 0), 2) Installment_principal, trunc(nvl(p.payinteamt, 0), 2) Installment_interest, 0 other_charge, trunc(nvl(p.payfineamt, 0), 2) Overdue_interest, trunc(nvl(p.paycompdinteamt, 0), 2) compound_interest, trunc(nvl(l.ACTUALPAYCORPUSAMT, 0), 2) Actpay_principal, trunc(nvl(l.ACTUALPAYINTEAMT, 0), 2) Actpay_interest, 0 as Actpay_charge, trunc(nvl(l.ACTUALFINEAMT, 0), 2) Actpay_Overdue_interest, trunc(nvl(l.ACTUALCOMPDINTEAMT, 0), 2) Actpay_compound_interest, l.LOANSERIALNO as LOANSERIALNO, p.corpusbalance as Outstanding_principal, trunc(nvl(l.ACTUALPAYCORPUSAMT, 0) + nvl(l.ACTUALPAYINTEAMT, 0) + nvl(l.ACTUALFINEAMT, 0) + nvl(l.ACTUALCOMPDINTEAMT, 0), 2) as Actpay_total from Acct_Payment_Log l, acct_payment_schedule p where l.psserialno = p.serialno and p.objecttype = 'Loan' order by l.Paydate) t
